Straight Shot and Quickstride do as instructed by Perceptor, and instead of=
 trying to get the threads off Rodimus, they try to scan for signs of life.=
  Using information comming from internal scanners, Straight Shot nodds, an=
d indeed picks up a faint sign of life from within the cocoon surrounding R=
odimus.

" It's faint Perceptor but he is alive.  And appears to be stable.=
"

Tucson slows down to a halt.  He knew wheels would not do him any good a=
t this point.

" I'm sorry, but I will not be able to carry everyone to the=
 surface. it's a straight climb up without proper foot holds, or ramps.  I'=
ll have to transform if we're going to get up there.  Straight Shot, you're=
 small enough, you can get up there easilly.  I'll lend you a towe line so =
you can send it back down to aid the rest of us."

Straight Shot nodds.

" =
Right, gotchya."

Tucson opens his doors to let everyone out.  Quickstride =
now helps to get Rodimus ready for unloading.

 It takes Tuscon hours of driving, but finally Tuscon arrives at an

ning, a final break in the long monotony of near featureless

unneled walls. They at long last arrive at an opening to a

below. However looking up, several hundred feet up a tiny pinprick of
